# confirmationRequired(with:)

**Type Method**

Creates a result that asks Siri to verify the request that the user wants to continue.

## Declaration

```swift
class func confirmationRequired(with callCapabilityToConfirm: INCallCapability) -> Self
```

## Parameters

- **callCapabilityToConfirm**: The value which verifies the userâ€™s request that the user wants to continue.

## Return Value

A new [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCallCapabilityResolutionResult] object.

## Creating a Resolution Result Object

- **success(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution involves the successful matching of the specified call capability.
